document_data.name: Elbryn Scatterstars
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/281/The New Adventures of Volo: Lost Treasures of Cormyr, Part 4|78}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Elbryn Scatterstars''' was the head of his [[Cormyr]]ean family when they became ennobled in the early 13{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Elbryn had a slender build and always dressed in fine clothes without much pretense or ostentation. He had somewhat delicate features, blond hair with a mustache, and green eyes.
document_data.Personality: He was a [[wine]] connoisseur and an attentive host to guests of the Crown. King [[Dhalmass Obarskyr|Dhalmass]] appreciated and took advantage of his discretion as a seneschal of the [[Castle Obarskyr|Palace]].
document_data.Abilities: Elbryn was an astute businessman who gained significant wealth through strategic shipping contracts. He also enjoyed [[falcon]]ry.
document_data.Possessions: He had an extensive wardrobe of high-class clothing.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1227}}, Elbryn was part of an escort sent by Dhalmass to ensure the safety and comfort of an important [[Sembia]]n trade representative on the road to [[Immersea]]. While camping for the night, a stolen pay-wagon—known to history as [[Waevor's Wagon]]—barrelled through the group without forerunners or lights. Elbryn and fellow noble [[Tharim Roaringhorn]] were both struck by the careening conveyance and died from their injuries.
